steps: Season beef with salt and pepper. Set Instant Pot to Saut√© (High). Working in batches, brown beef in oil on all sides. Remove and set aside
Add onion, carrots, celery, and mushrooms to pot. Cook ~5 minutes until softened
Add garlic and tomato paste and cook 1 minute
Add broth and scrape bottom to release browned bits
Return beef to pot. Add remaining broth, potatoes, thyme, Worcestershire sauce, and bay leaf. Lock lid
Cook on HIGH pressure for 25 minutes. Natural release 10 minutes, then quick release
Whisk cornstarch and water together, then stir into stew along with frozen peas and Fine Herbs. Cook on Saute for 2 minutes until thickened
title: Instant Pot Beef Stew
